languageServers.name: CSS Language Server
instructions: To consume CSS language server you need to:
• Once vscode is installed, it will store the CSS language server in ${BASE_DIR}/resources/app/extensions/css-language-features/server/dist/node/cssServerMain.js
You will need to adjust ${BASE_DIR} with your base dir where cssServerMain.js file is stored.
• Windows OS, the file looks like C:/Users/${USER_NAME}/AppData/Local/Programs/Microsoft VS Code/resources/app/extensions/css-language-features/server/dist/node/cssServerMain.js.
• Mac OS OS, the file looks like TODO/Microsoft VS Code/resources/app/extensions/css-language-features/server/dist/node/cssServerMain.js.
